gov.nih.ncats.molwitch

Interface Atom


  • public interface Atom
    Object representation of a single atom.
    Author:
    katzelda

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getAtomicNumber

        int getAtomicNumber()
        Get the atomic number of this atom.
        Returns:
        the atomic number; should always be ≥ 1.

      • setAtomicNumber

        void setAtomicNumber(int atomicNumber)
        Set the atomic number of this atom.
        Parameters:
        atomicNumber -

      • getSymbol

        String getSymbol()
        Get the symbol for this atom, for example for Hydrogen, this method will return "H".
        Returns:
        the symbol; will never be null.

      • getBonds

        List<? extends Bond> getBonds()
        Get all the Bonds of this atom.
        Returns:
        the list of Bonds. If there are no bonds, then this method will return an empty list. Will never be null, nor will any elements in the list be null.

      • hasAromaticBond

        boolean hasAromaticBond()
        Does this atom have any aromatic bonds.
        Returns:
        true if it does; false otherwise.

      • getCharge

        int getCharge()
        Get the charge for this atom.
        Returns:
        the charge value.

      • getRadical

        int getRadical()

      • setRadical

        void setRadical(int radical)

      • getAtomCoordinates

        AtomCoordinates getAtomCoordinates()

      • setAtomCoordinates

        void setAtomCoordinates(AtomCoordinates atomCoordinates)

      • getChirality

        Chirality getChirality()

      • setChirality

        void setChirality(Chirality chirality)

      • getExactMass

        double getExactMass()

      • getMassNumber

        int getMassNumber()
        Gets the atom mass, if is specific isotope, otherwise 0 for natural abundance
        Returns:
        0 if the atom represents the generic element with the isotopes in the natural abundance, or a positive integer for the mass of the specific isotope.

      • setCharge

        void setCharge(int charge)
        Sets the charge for this atom.
        Parameters:
        charge - the formal charge for this atom; may be positive, or negative or zero.

      • setMassNumber

        void setMassNumber(int mass)
        Sets the atom mass, usually only called for isotopes.
        Parameters:
        mass - if this is specific isotope, then the value should be the mass of this isotope. If this value is 0, then the mass is the natural abundance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if mass is negative.

      • getImplicitHCount

        int getImplicitHCount()

      • isInRing

        boolean isInRing()

      • getBondCount

        default int getBondCount()
        Get the total number of bonds. This is the same as getBonds().size().
        Returns:
        the number of bonds as an int will always be ≥ 0.

      • getBondCount

        default int getBondCount(Bond.BondType type)
        Get the number of bonds on this atom that are the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - the Bond.BondType to count; can not be null.
        Returns:
        the number of bonds as an int will always be ≥ 0.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if type is null.

      • getValence

        OptionalInt getValence()

      • getAtomToAtomMap

        OptionalInt getAtomToAtomMap()

      • setAtomToAtomMap

        void setAtomToAtomMap(int value)
        set the atom to atom map value a value of 0 means no mapping set.
        Parameters:
        value - if 0 then no map otherwise gt; 0 means map is set to 1-based atom index ?

      • clearAtomToAtomMap

        default void clearAtomToAtomMap()
        Default implementation same as setAtomToAtomMap(0)
